name: HorseRaceTest
description:
This game is a multiplayer horse race game prototype which inspiration by zed.run 

room stuff: players can create own room or join any room in the room list.

*in the room, every player should tab ready button. If everyone ready, room owner can start the game.

in this version there is no any bet system in the game. Players should use voice chat or something to communicate.

Controls:
WASD for movement, mouse for look around.

*Only room owner can start the race with "R" button. When race finished master can start new race again with "R".
